attributes.action: When new pm is voted call a general election we need a pm that we voted for.
attributes.additional_details:
Jeremy hunt broke our nhs

And borris's untrue sign on the bus and also the fact he acts like a child be telling a committee member to get stuffed how can we trust these men to run our country
attributes.background: Both contenders are blatant liars so we should vote what we want as PM NOT WHAT THEIR OWN PARTY WANT
